safari-enable-extension-title.message: Oops! It looks like the Safari extension isn’t enabled. Here’s how to set it up:

safari-enable-extension-instruction3.message: 3. Tap the toggle to turn on Adblock Plus and tap Done

safari-enable-extension-instruction-tap-.message: Tap on the review button at the top or the [[IMG:safari_menu_icon]] in the address bar

safari-enable-extension-instruction-alwa.message: Then tap "Always Allow on Every Website"
